title: Just Breathe: COVID Stories from the Heart of Minnesota in the Words of Caregivers
description: A collection of stories, letters and creative writing from the frontline staff during the COVID pandemic at CentraCare, a health system located in Central Minnesota. St. Cloud Hospital Medical Unit 1 nurses Lisa Kilgard, Amanda Shank and Nicole May, helped to compile this written history from their colleagues. Every story in this book is that authorâ€™s own experience and feelings. "Just Breathe" provides a small glimpse into both traumatic and rewarding experiences nurses, physicians and hospital team members encountered - all in their words. By sharing these stories with one another, the hope is to bring about a sense of peace, understanding, and healing.
author: Lisa Kilgard
